Docs.summary: Represents the method that handles the event of an control. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When you create an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListSelectEventHandler> delegate for an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control, you identify the method that handles the event. The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> control notifies the handler when an item event is generated. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
